name: The Dev Glitch: A GlitchTechs FanGame
name_original: The Dev Glitch: A GlitchTechs FanGame
description:
this game was made for the MFGG FANGAME JAM in 5 days with the theme “crossover” ◉ᴗ◉

The game is based on a very underrated animated show called Glitch Techs

Story: The techs arrive at a game developer’s house with massive glitchy energy, only for chaos to break loose and send glitches all across the neighborhood 

The levels were cut short in order to finish in time :( but I might add more in the future

Hope y’all enjoy
